AI Description: Arrow-R is an open-source statistical computing and graphics software program based on the R programming language. It provides advanced statistical analysis, data visualization, and modeling capabilities for researchers and statisticians.
Core Features:
1. Comprehensive statistical analysis tools
2. Advanced data visualization capabilities
3. Extensive libraries for statistical modeling
4. Integration with R programming language
5. Support for custom functions and packages
6. Interactive graphics and plots
General Tags: Statistical Computing, Data Visualization, Statistical Modeling, R Programming
